messages.subject: Re: Teresa Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Interesting things..
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/5/03 7:44:56 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... LOL.. sure, Teresa, I will try.. I confess, I am a terrible at shortening any writing I do.
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/5/03 7:44:56 PM Eastern Standard Time,
colnewt@... writes:

> Could you possibly put paragraph breaks in your longer posts? It makes them
> much easier to read. :)
>
> Teresa G.
>

LOL.. sure, Teresa, I will try.. I confess, I am a terrible at "shortening"
any writing I do. My most feared assignment in school was to write a SHORT
STORY.. ( shriek.!) I try to put breaks in when I change topics, but I
know I am guilty of just running on and on. I promise to make a
consciencous effort the next long post I write

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
To Teresa from Teresa G:

Could you possibly put paragraph breaks in your longer posts? It makes them much easier to read. :)

Teresa G.
